attributes.action: Keep the voting age at 18 and stop it being reduced to 16
attributes.additional_details: A person at 16 has limited life experience and is a very easy target to be lured into voting irresponsibly.
attributes.background: Act responsible and keep the voting age at 18

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Don't lower the voting age to 16: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733604

We call for a referendum before extending voting rights to 16 & 17-year-olds: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733679
